Title: Anthropic Claude Opus 4.1 is now available in public preview in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse
EnhancedContent:
Claude Opus 4.1 is rolling out in public preview to users of GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse.

## Availability in GitHub Copilot

Claude Opus 4.1 is available to Copilot Enterprise and Pro+ plans. You will be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile, VS Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse through the chat model picker (**Agent**, **Ask**, and **Edit** modes). If you do not yet have access, please continue to check back.

## Enabling access

Copilot Enterprise administrators must opt in by enabling the new Claude Opus 4.1 policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see **Claude Opus 4.1** in the model picker.

To learn more about the models available in Copilot, see [our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/model-hosting#anthropic-models) and get started with Copilot today.
